admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would finance the
            foreign exchange costs of: (a) the services of consultants
            to assist the Transportation Planning Board; and (b) part of
            TRA's 1971-74 expansion program consisting largely of
            track strengthening; the purchase of signalling,
            telecommunications and freight handling equipment;
            improvements to station and marshalling yards, workshops,
            depots and warehouses; and the acquisition of some
            specialized freight cars.
